After thorough review this weekend, we noticed that the compliance check for new contracts stopped working completely if the 'contract_type' is not set to 'standard'. This poses two major problems: 1. Compliance cannot be verified if the contract type is not set. 2. Changes made to the legal system that haven't been properly tested cannot be applied in production. Imagine if we had 100 contracts reviewed without proper compliance checks, and they were approved over the weekend! It would cause a legal nightmare!

Hello,
The contract type configuration is critical for ensuring compliance checks are performed correctly. We recommend scheduling a system review to go through the scenarios where compliance was not applied properly.
Thank you.
Best regards, Legal Support Team.
